alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; South Lincoln County; Star Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:43PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sublette and Lincoln Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 842 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Smoot to near Cokeville to near Randolph. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Cokeville around 850 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Smoot, Mount Wagner, Corral Creek Guard Station, Mount Coffin, Wyoming Peak, Middle Piney Lake and Elkol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; South Lincoln County; Star Valley
